stance_1: Doctor advised me to eat less red meat
stance_2: I am trying to cut back on meat consumption
justification: The interviewee states that the doctor's advice is the direct reason for trying to cut back on meat consumption.

stance_1: Doctor advised me to eat less red meat
stance_2: I want to lower my cholesterol
justification: The doctor's advice to eat less red meat was explicitly linked to helping lower cholesterol.

stance_1: I am trying to cut back on meat consumption
stance_2: I had meat cravings when cutting back

stance_1: I am trying to cut back on meat consumption

stance_1: I am trying to cut back on meat consumption

stance_1: I usually eat meat with every meal

stance_1: I usually eat meat with every meal

stance_1: Meat is a big part of my family traditions
